S0001: I want to speak Spanish with you now.
S0003: cómo hablar tan a menudo como sea posible.
how to speak as often as possible.
S0004: how to say something in Spanish
S0005: Voy a practicar hablar con alguien más.
I'm going to practise speaking with someone else.
S0006: I'm trying to remember a word.
S0007: Quiero intentar tan duro como pueda hoy.
I want to try as hard as I can today.
S0008: Voy a intentar explicar lo que quiero decir.
I'm going to try to explain what I mean.
S0009: Hablo un poco de español ahora.
I speak a little Spanish now.
S0010: No estoy seguro si puedo recordar toda la oración.
I'm not sure if I can remember the whole sentence.
S0011: Me gustaría poder hablar después de que termines.
I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.
S0012: No me gustaría adivinar qué va a pasar mañana.
I wouldn't like to guess what's going to happen tomorrow.
S0014: Do you speak Spanish all day?
S0015: Y quiero que hables español conmigo mañana.
And I want you to speak Spanish with me tomorrow.
S0016: Él quiere volver con todos los demás más tarde.
He wants to come back with everyone else later on.
S0017: Ella quiere averiguar cuál es la respuesta.
She wants to find out what the answer is.
S0018: Queremos reunirnos a las seis de la tarde.
We want to meet at six o'clock this evening.
S0019: Pero no quiero dejar de hablar.
But I don't want to stop talking.
S0020: You want to learn his name quickly.
S0021: Why are you learning her name?
S0022: Porque quiero conocer gente que habla español.
Because I want to meet people who speak Spanish.
S0023: Voy a empezar a hablar más pronto.
I'm going to start talking more soon.
S0024: No voy a poder recordar fácilmente.
I'm not going to be able to remember easily.
S0025: ¿Vas a ayudarme antes de que tenga que irme?
Are you going to help me before I have to go?
S0026: Me gusta sentir como si estuviera casi listo para irme.
I like feeling as if I'm nearly ready to go.
S0027: No me gusta tomar demasiado tiempo para responder.
I don't like taking too much time to answer.
S0028: Es útil empezar a hablar tan pronto como puedas.
It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.
S0029: Tengo ganas de hablar mejor tan pronto como pueda.
I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.
S0030: I wanted to ask you something yesterday.
